Name: sot-sheikheliaskeke
Author: Sheikh Elias Keketso Lelia
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa (IDM)

Translations.Text: Ruri likhomong ho teng thuto ho lona. Re le nehile hore le noe se teng kahar’a limpa tsa tsona, lipakeng tsa bolokoe le mali a tsona ho teng lebese le hloekileng le bileng le natefelang ba le noang
Le litholoaneng tsa lipalema le merara, le fumana lino tse matlafatsang le eona phepo e matlafetseng le lijo. Bonang! Ruri kahar’a sena ke sesupo ho ba seli
Mong`a hau U rutile notsi ho aha sehlaha maralleng, lifateng le matlong a batho

Ebe e itjella litholoana tsohle le hona ho latela litsela tsa Mong`a eona tse pharaletseng. Kahar’a ‘mele ea tsona ho kolla seno se mebala e fapakaneng, ao e leng pheko ho batho. Ruri kahar’a ho sena ho teng sesupo ho ba nahanang

Ke Allah Ea le hlotseng, A ba A etsa hore le shoe; har’a lona ho teng ea busetsoang morao botsofaling, e le hore a tle a se hlole a tseba letho kamor’a hoba a be le tsebo. Ruri Allah U Tseba Tsohle, U Matla Oohle
